items.name: Gel Manicure
items.description: A dry precision manicure finished with a flawless gel polish application for a clean, glossy result.

items.name: Structured Gel Manicure (Rubber Base)
items.description: A structured manicure designed to reinforce natural nails using rubber base—flexible support that helps reduce breakage while creating a smooth, balanced apex.

items.name: Hard Gel Overlay
items.description: A builder gel overlay that adds strength and structure to natural nails, finished with a refined apex and long-lasting shine.

items.name: Gel-X Set
items.description: Lightweight, full-coverage extensions for a natural look and durable wear, finished with precision detailing.

items.name: Acrylic Full Set
items.description: Custom-shaped extensions with a durable acrylic overlay for long-lasting structure, strength, and a crisp finish.

items.name: Acrylic Refill
items.description: A structured rebalance for grown-out acrylic sets to restore shape, strength, and symmetry.

items.name: Men’s Manicure
items.description: A dry precision manicure focused on clean grooming, shape, and refined detailing.

items.name: Dry Pedicure
items.description: A waterless, detail-focused pedicure featuring precision nail work, advanced callus care, and gel polish application for smooth, polished feet.

items.name: French Design
items.description: Classic or modern french tip design added to any service.

items.name: Nail Design
items.description: Custom nail art. Price varies by complexity.

items.name: Nail Repair
items.description: Repair for a single broken or damaged nail.

items.name: Safe Product Removal
items.description: Gentle removal of existing product to preserve natural nail health.
